```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}

homicides <- read_csv("homicide-data.csv", col_names = TRUE) %>% 
  as_tibble() %>% 
  unite(col = "city_state", city, state, sep = ",", remove = TRUE) %>% 
  print()
```
```{r}
unsolved <- homicides %>% 
  group_by(disposition, city_state) %>%
  summarize(total = n()) %>% 
  print()
```
